name: part_001
file: tmp_【#バカタレ２周年記念LIVE】音楽ライブ♬　BAKATARATION PARTY【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ⧸不知火フレア⧸角巻わため】 [hQB206l932M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: The Bakatare trio performs a cover of 'Seijuu Sentai Gingaman' while riding hobby horses on stage.
The members catch their breath and talk about their performance and the stage setup during the MC segment.

subtitles.original: 闇を揺さぶる　風になれ　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Shake the darkness, become the wind, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 吠えろ　吠えろ　吠えろ　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Roar, roar, roar, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 大地をつかむ足音を聞け
subtitles.english: Listen to the footsteps gripping the earth.

subtitles.original: 強く　激しく　誰よりも高く
subtitles.english: Strongly, intensely, higher than anyone.

subtitles.original: 沈む太陽　引き上げるのさ　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: You'll pull up the sinking sun, Gingaman.

subtitles.original: ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン　ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman! Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 五つの叫び　とどろかせ
subtitles.english: Make five cries resound.

subtitles.original: ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン　ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman! Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 銀河をつらぬく伝説の刃
subtitles.english: The legendary blade that pierces the galaxy.

subtitles.original: 星獣戦隊ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Seijuu Sentai Gingaman

subtitles.original: バカタレ
subtitles.english: Bakatare

subtitles.original: 走れ　星も光も追い越して　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Run, overtaking even the stars and light, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 走れ　闇を切り裂く虹になれ　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Run, become a rainbow that cuts through the darkness, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 吠えろ　吠えろ　吠えろ　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Roar, roar, roar, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 嵐を目指す瞳をくれ
subtitles.english: Give me eyes that gaze into the storm.

subtitles.original: 強く　優しく　誰よりも熱く
subtitles.english: Strongly, kindly, more passionately than anyone.

subtitles.original: 燃える太陽　信じてるのさ　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Believing in the burning sun, Gingaman.

subtitles.original: ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン　ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman! Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 五つの願いを胸に秘め
subtitles.english: Keeping five wishes hidden in your heart.

subtitles.original: ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン　ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman! Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 銀河をつらぬく伝説の刃
subtitles.english: The legendary blade that pierces the galaxy.

subtitles.original: 星獣戦隊ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Seijuu Sentai Gingaman

subtitles.original: バカタレ
subtitles.english: Bakatare

subtitles.original: ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン　ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman! Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 五つの叫び　とどろかせ
subtitles.english: Make five cries resound.

subtitles.original: ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン　ガンガンギギン　ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman! Gan Gan Gi Gin, Gingaman!

subtitles.original: 銀河をつらぬく伝説の刃
subtitles.english: The legendary blade that pierces the galaxy.

subtitles.original: 星獣戦隊ギンガマン
subtitles.english: Seijuu Sentai Gingaman

subtitles.original: バカタレ
subtitles.english: Bakatare

subtitles.original: はーい！ということでですね、始まりました、BAKATARATION PARTY、イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! So, BAKATARATION PARTY has officially begun! Yay!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: どうも高い位置から失礼いたします
subtitles.english: Sorry for addressing you from such a high position.

subtitles.original: 失礼いたします
subtitles.english: Excuse us!

subtitles.original: 馬に乗らせていただきまして、なんか走ってましたね、この子可愛い
subtitles.english: We're riding horses, and they were actually running. This one's so cute.

subtitles.original: ね
subtitles.english: Right?

subtitles.original: よしよしよしよし。…あれ、わためぇのそれ羊？
subtitles.english: There, there. ...Wait, Watame, is that a sheep?

subtitles.original: 羊じゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it a sheep?

subtitles.original: いや、馬だよ！
subtitles.english: No, it's a horse!

subtitles.original: 馬か！
subtitles.english: A horse, huh!

subtitles.original: 羊じゃないよ！
subtitles.english: It's not a sheep!

subtitles.original: 馬か！
subtitles.english: A horse!

subtitles.original: カッコいいでしょ！
subtitles.english: Doesn't it look cool?

subtitles.original: あ、これ、あ、なんか草食べてる、草食べてる
subtitles.english: Oh, look. Ah, it's eating grass. It's eating grass.

subtitles.original: 草食べてる、大丈夫か？
subtitles.english: It's eating grass. Is it okay?

subtitles.original: 元気出してね、草食べて元気出して。
subtitles.english: Cheer up, okay? Eat grass and feel better.

subtitles.original: ということでですね、1曲目は『進め！バカタレ！』さんでしたー！
subtitles.english: So, the first song was 'Advance! Bakatare!'

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: はい！潔い！なんかダンスをちらっと間違えた人がいたような気がするんですが…
subtitles.english: Yes! How gallant! I feel like someone might have made a slight mistake in the dance...

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: おお、潔い
subtitles.english: Oh, how straightforward.

subtitles.original: はい、間違えました。最後ね、あの、こうなんだけど、こうなっちゃった
subtitles.english: Yes, I messed up. At the end, it was supposed to be like this, but I did this.

subtitles.original: ああ、そうなってたね
subtitles.english: Ah, you did do that.

subtitles.original: で、わためぇもなんか…
subtitles.english: And Watame, you also...

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 本当はこうなのに、フブちゃんのほう向いておてて繋ぎに行っちゃった
subtitles.english: I was supposed to do this, but I turned to Fubuchan and tried to hold hands.

subtitles.original: 最後ね、おてて繋ぎに行っちゃったね
subtitles.english: Yeah, you went to hold hands at the end.

subtitles.original: そしてフブちゃんは？
subtitles.english: And what about you, Fubuchan?

subtitles.original: 私はもう間違えるわけないですよ
subtitles.english: There's no way I would ever make a mistake.

subtitles.original: おおー！
subtitles.english: Ooh!

subtitles.original: 間違えてなかったですよ！サビのダンス考えたの白上なんですから！
subtitles.english: I didn't mess up! After all, I'm the one who choreographed the chorus dance!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、そういうことにしときますか
subtitles.english: Well, let's just go with that then.

subtitles.original: ええー！？
subtitles.english: Whaaat?!
